headline: Ask HN: What are some good places to get a jump start on the state of crypto dev
description: i am interested in experimenting with tools and languages that are the current state of the art in crypto. i really only know about BTC and ETH and vaguely understand blockchain and would like to do some catching up and see where i could contribute or develop something new. there is a metric shit ton of info out there so rather than randomly googling around i would like to find some solid sources of jumpstart info for someone new like myself but who has dev skills. i am interested in ways to create coins, contracts, etc but really all info is welcome.
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 有哪些好地方可以让你对加密货币的发展状况有一个初步的了解？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 有哪些好地方可以讓你對加密貨幣的發展狀況有一個初步的瞭解？
description_zh-Hans: 我真的只知道BTC和ETH，对区块链的理解也很模糊，我想做一些补课，看看我在哪里可以做出贡献或开发新的东西。
description_zh-Hant: 我真的只知道BTC和ETH，對區塊鏈的理解也很模糊，我想做一些補課，看看我在哪裡可以做出貢獻或開發新的東西。
